entry.title: EOS Ethereum Virtual Machine Testnet Goes Live Ahead of April Mainnet Deployment
entry.summary: The network is the final testnet before a mainnet deployment in April as part of a broader revival plan for EOS.

entry.title: CFTC Could Force Binance to Cease U.S. Operations as Part of Settlement: Bernstein
entry.summary: The crypto exchange will look to safeguard its dominant international business, which is its cash cow, the report said.

entry.title: Hacker Behind $200M Euler Attack Apologizes, Returns Millions in Ether, Dai to Protocol
entry.summary: The attacker sent over 7,000 ether to Euler Tuesday and seemingly apologized for their actions in a transaction message.

entry.title: CFTC Sues Binance, CEO Zhao Over 'Willful Evasion' of U.S. Laws, Unregistered Crypto Derivatives Products
entry.summary: The U.S. Commodity Futures Trading Commission (CFTC) sued crypto exchange Binance and founder Changpeng â€œCZâ€ Zhao Monday on allegations the company knowingly offered unregistered crypto derivatives products in the U.S. against federal law. The lawsuit alleges Binance operated a derivatives trading operation in the U.S., offering trades for cryptocurrencies including bitcoin (BTC), ether (ETH), litecoin (LTC), tether (USDT) and Binance USD (BUSD), which the suit referred to as commodities. The suit also alleged that the company, under CZâ€™s leadership, directed its employees to spoof their locations through the use of virtual private networks.

entry.title: Do You Believe in (Bitcoin) Magic?
entry.summary: NFTs continued to grow beyond their humble Ethereum roots this week, with Magic Eden becoming the first major NFT marketplace to offer Bitcoin-based collectibles on its platform. Web3 gaming was also in the spotlight, as Sony filed a patent that could make NFTs transferable between different games and consoles. Meanwhile, blockchains Immutable and Polygon announced a major partnership aimed at making it easier for developers and game studios to jump into Web3.

entry.title: A Three Arrows Capital Founder Talks About His New Crypto Bankruptcy Exchange

entry.title: Circle Scrambles to Right USDC After Signature Bank Failure
entry.summary: Circle Internet Financialâ€™s $3.3 billion cash reserves problem was seemingly solved Sunday when federal regulators promised that depositors of failed Silicon Valley Bank would be made whole in short order. But Circleâ€™s USDC stablecoin isnâ€™t out of the woods.

entry.title: Signature, Silicon Valley Bank Depositors Will be Made Whole
entry.summary: Taxpayers will not be forced to bail out either bank, as Signature is added to the list of failures

author.name: Blockworks: News and insights about digital assets.

entry.title: Silicon Valley Bank Depositors Will Have Access to "All" Funds Monday, Say Federal Regulators
entry.summary: In a joint statement, federal banking and finance regulators said depositors will be made whole.

entry.title: Crypto-Friendly Signature Bank Shut Down by State Regulators
entry.summary: New York-based Signature Bank, which has a number of crypto clients, was shut down Sunday by state regulators, the Federal Reserve announced.

entry.title: Ripple Had â€˜Some Exposureâ€™ to Silicon Valley Bank, Says CEO
entry.summary: Ripple, best known for its connection to XRP, kept some capital at the failed Silicon Valley Bank.

entry.title: Bitcoin Rises on Report Government Weighing Plan to Protect All Silicon Valley Bank Depositors
entry.summary: The price of the largest cryptocurrency briefly rose back above $21,500 before giving back some gains.

entry.title: USDC Volatility Lifts Bitcoin's Coinbase Premium to 3-Year High
entry.summary: Coinbase premium is usually taken to represent stronger buying pressure from stateside investors. But that's not the case this time.

entry.title: Mastercard, Visa Ink Fresh Crypto Debit Cards With Web3 Startups
entry.summary: Despite all the drama, payments giants Mastercard and Visa are still signing new debit card deals with crypto startups around the world

author.name: Blockworks: News and insights about digital assets.

entry.title: Yellen Says No to SVB Bailout, but Says Government Is Working to Help Depositors
entry.summary: Yellen sought to ease concerns that the bankâ€™s collapse could lead to a domino effect.
